block.comment: Replicate Q&A Temporary Table - used for reprocessing in HISTORY table
If Vendor ID is New and History is not present
Loop Second set of Q&A list if present
Check if Response BODY of API 2nd Call is Not NULL
CHECK if Response Body is Present else Exit this LOOP
REPEAT API Calls - for next set of records - until end of Pagination Count

input.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT RECIPE_ID, VENDOR_SITE_CODE, INTERFACE_ERROR, RECORD_METHOD, VENDOR_NAME, CREATION_DATE, INTERFACE_STATUS,ARIBA_VENDOR_ID,VENDOR_ID, INTERFACE_ID
	FROM XXRHFIN.XXRH_SUPPLIER_IMPORT_ALTER_STG
    WHERE RECIPE_ID = :RECIPE_ID and CREATION_DATE > SYSDATE -1

extended_input_schema.hint: First provide the full name assigned to your bind variable in the WHERE condition. e.g. id Second, provide the actual parameter value. Parameter values can be static or datapills. Select the closest corresponding data type that your database is expecting for the bind variable
extended_input_schema.label: Parameters
extended_input_schema.name: parameters

block.name: send_mail

input.subject: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"project_property","property_name":"p_workato_instance"}')}: New Record for Supplier Master created Successfully
input.body:
Supplier Master Data

New record has got processed from Workato towards Oracle ERP.

Vendor ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0658825c","path":["record","Vendor IDs"]}')} API Pagination Count #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"1fa8baf6","path":["varAPIListCount"]}')}
Job Started At#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0658825c","path":["record","Job Created At"]}')}
Vendor Name #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0658825c","path":["record","Vendor Name"]}')}
Total Site(s) #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"574e5f45","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"size"}]}')} Supplier Site Address(s) with #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"495aca1b","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"size"}]}')} Operating Unit (s) has been recorded to Oracle table
Total Bank(s)#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"54a78a4c","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"size"}]}')} Supplier Bank(s) details with #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"d7f9e1c9","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"size"}]}')} Intermediate Bank(s) has been recorded to Oracle tables
Oracle Request ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0658825c","path":["record","ORA Request ID"]}')}
Oracle ERP Vendor ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0658825c","path":["record","ORA ERP Vendor ID"]}')}
Oracle Return Status #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0658825c","path":["record","ORA Return Status"]}')}
Job Completed At #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0658825c","path":["record","Job Completed At"]}')}
#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_template","line":"58a8af79","path":["document"]}')}

Oracle ERP Vendor ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0658825c","path":["record","ORA ERP Vendor ID"]}')}
Oracle Return Status #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0658825c","path":["record","ORA Return Status"]}')}
